reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fairly new hotel with nice facilities. Much more modern/ updated than I had come to expect in Guatemala. Great pool, you can enjoy your breakfast outside or in the dining room overlooking the water.
reviews.title: Great value, clean & comfortable w/great breakfast & pool...

likes.liked: — Modern conveniences/construction; beautiful pool & deck with water view; nice breakfast buffet.
likes.disliked: — Could have been cleaned up a bit in the common areas.
